com.salimov.yurii.entity

Class Article

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salimov.yurii.entity.Model<ID>
      • com.salimov.yurii.entity.Content<java.lang.Long>
        • com.salimov.yurii.entity.Article
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    @Entity
public final class Article
extends Content<java.lang.Long>
    The class implements a set of standard methods for working with entity of the Article class.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Yurii Salimov (yurii.alex.salimov@gmail.com)
    See Also:
    Content, Model, Serialized Form

        public void setNumber(java.lang.String number)
        Sets new number to the article. If parameter number is blank, then call method newNumber().

      • newNumber

        public void newNumber()
        Generates new number to the article. To generate used a pattern Model.CODE_PATTERN and length Model.CODE_LENGTH.

      • setCategory

        public void setCategory(Category category)
        Sets a new category to the article. Sets a new category if this category equals null or this category not equals new category. Also the article deletes from old category and adds to new category.
        Parameters:
        category - a new category to the article.
        See Also:
